snippet: More than 300,000 people have been displaced by flooding in Malawi, almost twice as many as previously estimated, the United Nations Children’s Fund said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: More than 300,000 people have been displaced by flooding in Malawi, almost twice as many as previously estimated, the United Nations Children’s Fund said Thursday.

headline.main: Malawi: Estimate of Floods’ Toll Rises
headline.print_headline: Malawi: Estimate of Floods’ Toll Rises
